page.title: 03BLUNTISHAM HEATH TIP
page.content: In Bluntisham there is a rubbish tip which has been open since 1965. Next to the tip there is a farm called Bridge Farm and the methane gas collected from the tip is used on Bridge Farm to grow mushrooms. The opening hours are: Monday_Friday 8.00am_4.00pm Saturday & Sunday 9.00_12.00noon Bank holiday, closed. Most people come on a Saturday or Sunday when there are about 200 people visiting it.On other days there are about 50 people.There are 6 skips(19 cubic metres)made of iron.There is also an oil holder for any waste oil.
